comments:
3.0 (self-hosted with latest SWT/UI from HEAD), GTK+ 2.4.1, KDE 3.2.2, Linux 
2.6.7. 
 
I found the following exception in my log.  I have no idea what caused it, or 
how to reproduce it.  It is possible that this lead to a compile error of the 
form: "this project needs to be rebuilt".  Subsequent rebuilding led to no 
further errors in the log, or in the user interface.
